title: 56 KEY Differences Between MORTAL KOMBAT (1995) and MORTAL KOMBAT (2021)
author: Think Story
comment:
WHICH MORTAL KOMBAT REIGNS SUPREME!? 1995 or 2021?

GET OVER HERE... and watch my other Mortal Kombat Ending Explained video: https://youtu.be/lYuhEcmPC7g
True fans know that the 95 movie was based on the first 2 games, and had limited lore for character stories connections. Obviously the new film now has 2 decades of lore to make it way different.
I think Kano survives the 2021 version and that's how he gets his metal eye.

You missed a little nice throwback to the game, when Lui fights Kano in the pit .... Lui is spamming the same move over and over (the roundhouse swipe kick) , which is a direct refrence to people spamming the same move in MK over and over and over xD Kano even says "Is that the only move you know?"  They even show him failing to predict the next move and getting hit by it ..... i thought it was a nice touch xD

*nightwolf 
*”you’re gonna need a seeing eye dog”
description:
Mortal Kombat was one of my favorite action movies growing up so I thought it would be fun to see the main differences with the new HBO Max version starring Lewis Tan, Jessica McNamee, and Hiroyuki Sanada.

Check out my Mortal Kombat Ending Explained video here:
